description.value:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.Utxq3fo8AoPyfh4K]{Lastwall Sentry}
Prerequisites member of the Knights of Lastwall, Shield Block
Access You are from the Eye of Dread region.

Youâ€™ve sworn yourself as a sentry for the Knights of Lastwall, the first line of defense against incursions by the Whispering Tyrant throughout Golarion. You become trained in Athletics and in Undead Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. Finally, you gain the Reactive Shield fighter feat.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Lastwall sentry archetype.

prerequisites.value: member of the Knights of Lastwall, Shield Block
